backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control, storage mixins, domain models for benches, documents, components, users, and query methods for retrieving test benches.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with authenticated routes, theme provider, and global error boundary.
Empty placeholder file for an admin permission gate.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React class component catching rendering errors and showing a reload option.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Gate component that waits for backend actor initialization and shows errors if unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard that blocks access until Internet Identity is loaded and valid.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Generic draggable list component supporting drag-and-drop reordering with visual cues.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: React hook managing drag state and ordered list updates for draggable items.
Main application layout with header navigation, theme toggle, logout handling, and outlet rendering.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows scroll-to-top and scroll-to-bottom shortcut buttons based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Grid picker for predefined avatar images, highlighting the selected option.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar from predefined or custom sources with size options and fallback icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists the user's preferred dashboard chart type using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
Periodically updates the user's last-seen timestamp using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as benches, profiles, and roles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Empty placeholder for an admin benches management panel.
Empty placeholder for an admin documents management panel.
Empty placeholder for an admin users management panel.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Detail view for a single bench, showing components, documents, history, and allowing edits or deletion.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Lists all benches with search, filtering, photo previews, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal for creating a new bench with fields for metadata, photo upload, documents, tags, and components.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Table editor to add, edit, and remove bench components with expiration status calculation.
Manages bench documents including upload, download, categorization, and deletion.
Displays a list of bench history entries sorted by timestamp, rendering each entry with user info, timestamp, and details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error handling, falling back to a placeholder on failure.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Manages editable document categories, allowing adding/removing categories and uploading files with version metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Provides a modal form for editing bench details, validating inputs, updating photos, and submitting changes.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Lets users add, remove, and select tags with autocomplete suggestions and keyboard support.
Placeholder page describing planned features for creating a new bench.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Generates a pie chart summarizing component health statuses across benches using expiration logic.
Displays a filterable bar chart counting components by criticality status across benches.
Computes expiration buckets for components based on selected bench and time range, rendering a bar chart of counts.
Counts documents by category and displays the distribution in a pie chart with fallback for empty data.
Aggregates component expirations per month and shows the last 12 months in either a bar or line chart.
Calculates expired components per bench and displays the top ten in a bar or line chart with an empty state.
Computes overall health percentages for components (OK, expiring soon, expired) and displays them with progress bars.
Builds a reorderable statistics section containing stat cards and charts, persisting layout order in local storage.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads dashboard data, computes component statuses, manages section ordering, and renders statistics, charts, and actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: React profile management page handling user info, avatar selection, expiration settings, and saving via backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Simple login screen using Internet Identity with error display and sign‑in button.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Maps avatar IDs to image paths and provides helpers to fetch avatar paths and IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a File as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and converts a default test bench placeholder image into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads an ExternalBlob as a file by generating a temporary Blob URL.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration threshold logic with localStorage fallback and computes per‑bench expiration status.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a simple unique ID using timestamp and random string.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Heuristically rewrites bench descriptions by normalizing whitespace, capitalization, punctuation, and abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Searches test benches by matching query terms against name, code, description, and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates email, domain, AGILE code, semantic versions, and URLs with basic rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node‑side tooling using ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variable injection, path aliasing, dev server proxying, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Project state describing UI update requests, including avatar consistency and Safran image sizing adjustments, with metadata on features and requests.
